name: Willy the Kid
description: Use as many 'Bang' as you want.

name: Bart Cassidy
description: Everytime he loss 1hp, draw a card.

name: Black Jack
description: Show the second card, if red, draw another card.

name: El Gringo
description: Did a damage on one, then draw a card from one's hand.

name: Jesse Jones
description: Draw a card from anyone's hand as his first card.

name: Jourdonnais
description: Can do a judge when targeted by 'Bang', if Heart then evade.

name: Kit Carlson
description: Seek the top three card on deck, choose two as his draw, put the other back to top.

name: Lucky Duke
description: Everytime he needs to judge, draw two card and choose one to examine.

name: Pedro Ramirez
description: Can take the card on top of deposit as one of his draw.

name: Slab the Killer
description: The target of the 'Bang' needs two 'Missed' to evade damage.

name: Suzy Lafayette
description: If no card in hand, draw a card.

name: Vulture Sam
description: If anyone is wiped out, take over all one's cards.
